intro_text: Your patrol comes across a shrew.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c drops into a crouch and stalks towards the shrew. They pounce on it, swiftly killing it with a bite to the back of the head.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c drops into a crouch and silently treads towards the shrew. At the last second, the shrew looks up, but r_c is quick to pounce and cut off its escape.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c drops into a perfect hunting crouch and stalks the oblivious shrew until they're in striking distance. The shrew almost slips away, but s_c catches it with one paw and flings it towards their mouth for the killing bite.

fail_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol narrowly misses the shrew.

decline_text: Your patrol decides to look for other prey.

intro_text: The patrol looks around for something to disguise their scent while hunting.

success_text.unscathed_common: They can't think of anything that would work, but their hunt goes well regardless.
success_text.unscathed_rare: A snowy patch will do! The plan works and their hunt goes well.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c leads them to some moose dung on the slopes - it's not clean, but it's extremely effective, and the patrol hunts well.
success_text.stat_trait: s_c tells the patrol to roll in a patch of garlic to disguise their scent, which works perfectly. It's a funny taste to wash off their pelts though.

fail_text.unscathed_common: The patrol finds nothing to disguise their scent, and no prey either.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: The patrol finds no prey; it seems like all the prey was scared off because of their stench!

intro_text: r_c looks around for something to disguise their scent while hunting.

success_text.unscathed_common: They can't think of anything that would work, but their hunt goes well regardless.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c finds some moose dung on the slopes - it's not clean, but it's extremely effective, and the hunt goes well.
success_text.stat_trait: s_c rolls in a patch of garlic to disguise their scent, which works perfectly. It's a funny taste to wash off their pelt though.

fail_text.unscathed_common: The patrol finds nothing to disguise their scent, and no prey either.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: r_c finds no prey; it seems like all the prey was scared off because of their stench!

intro_text: r_c's mentor assesses them by sending them on a solo hunt.
decline_text: r_c asks their mentor to do the assessment some other time.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c manages a skillful catch, and brings it back to the camp to show everyone!
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c focuses completely on their test, slipping into a cleareyed, razor focused routine of catch and stash, catch and stash. Eventually they've caught enough to need their mentor's help carrying it back to camp, and the feeling seeing their prey stock the fresh-kill pile - they feel ready to burst with happiness!
success_text.stat_trait: It's a terrible day for hunting, the prey running sparse and alert. But s_c takes their time and doesn't let the conditions discourage them, until eventually the perfect opportunity falls into place and they pull off a perfect catch!

fail_text.unscathed_common: Hunting is poor, and while r_c's mentor is disappointed, they don't expect r_c to be able to catch what isn't there.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c is too hasty, bouncing after first one prey, then another, and it ends with them empty pawed and exhausted. Their mentor is disappointed - they clearly need more training.
fail_text.injury: During the hunt, r_c tumbles right down a steep slope while their attention is elsewhere. Bruised and sore, r_c has to report to the medicine cat den when they return to camp.

history_text.scar: r_c got injured as an apprentice, exploring alone.

intro_text: r_c heads out onto the mountains alone, wanting to sink their teeth into some prey and have some time to themselves.
decline_text: r_c turns back to camp, deciding that a group hunt would be more effective.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c heads off to one of their favorite spots in the mountains, a gully with stepped ridges running up and down its sides providing excellent ambush chances. And what do you know, they are bush! Or they were as far as that ground squirrel thought.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c finds a fat, dumb, slow rabbit, and they can barely drag the thing back to camp, but by the stars it's juicy when they sit down to eat it with their Clanmates.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c gets the chance to try out an idea they've been sitting on for a while. There's a nest of pika that they've spotted that's particularly badly built, and they manage to dig down into one of the dens, fishing out small rodents by the handful.
success_text.stat_trait: The prey is running terribly today. But s_c has patience, and wisely waits for the perfect opportunity instead of getting frustrated. They come back to camp with a good contribution to the Clan's stores, having had a relaxing day sitting with their thoughts while waiting for the prey to come to them.

fail_text.unscathed_common: You can't catch what isn't there, and the prey today is very not there.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c starts the day with endless energy, but as one hunt fails after another, it very quickly runs dry. The come back to camp, empty pawed and prickling with frustration.

intro_text: r_c heads out onto the mountains alone, wanting to sink their teeth into some prey and have some time to themselves.
decline_text: r_c turns back to camp, deciding that a group hunt would be more effective.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c heads off to one of their favorite spots in the mountains, a gully with stepped ridges running up and down its sides providing excellent ambush chances. And what do you know, they are bush! Or they were as far as that ground squirrel thought. They snicker to themselves as they pad back to camp.
success_text.unscathed_rare: r_c finds a fat, dumb, slow rabbit, and they can barely drag the thing back to camp, but by the stars it's juicy when they sit down to eat it with their Clanmates. Purring, they take the opportunity for a small moment of peace, relaxing with their friends.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c gets the chance to try out an idea they've been sitting on for a while. There's a nest of pika that they've spotted that's particularly badly built, and they manage to dig down into one of the dens, fishing out small rodents by the handful. This is a good spot to remember when c_n hits hard times in leaf-bare.
success_text.stat_trait: The prey is running terribly today. But s_c has patience, and wisely waits for the perfect opportunity instead of getting frustrated. They come back to camp with a good contribution to the Clan's stores, having had a relaxing day sitting with their thoughts while waiting for the prey to come to them.

fail_text.unscathed_common: You can't catch what isn't there, and the prey today is very not there.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c starts the day with endless energy, but as one hunt fails after another, it very quickly runs dry. They give up and return to camp, to try and at least make progress on all the work piling up there.

intro_text: r_c heads out onto the mountains alone, wanting to sink their teeth into some prey and have some time to themselves.
decline_text: r_c turns back to camp, deciding that a group hunt would be more effective.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c heads off to one of their favorite spots in the mountains, a gully with stepped ridges running up and down its sides providing excellent ambush chances. There's a nest of pika that they've spotted that's particularly badly built, and they manage to dig down into one of the dens, fishing out small rodents by the handful. This is a good spot to remember when c_n hits hard times in leaf-bare.

They come back to camp with a good contribution to the Clan's stores, having had a relaxing day sitting with their thoughts while waiting for the prey to come to them.

fail_text.unscathed_common: You can't catch what isn't there, and the prey today is very not there.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c starts the day with endless energy, but as one hunt fails after another, it very quickly runs dry. They give up and return to camp, to try and at least make progress on all the work piling up there.

intro_text: As the patrol is checking the border lines, they hear an odd sound coming from just beyond a rock fall.
decline_text: It's probably nothing. The patrol leaves the noise alone and continues on their way.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c drops down into a hunting crouch, certain that a mouse must be the source of the noise. They find themselves to be correct when they pounce across the rocks and return to the patrol with the tasty morsel dangling from their mouth.
success_text.stat_skill: p_l pads towards the rock fall to check on the noise when a rabbit suddenly bursts out! s_c is quick to react and manages to snag the rabbit before it can disappear.

fail_text.unscathed_common: p_l pads towards the rock fall to check on the noise when a rabbit suddenly bursts out! None of the cats are quick enough to catch it, but at least the noise was nothing dangerous.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c doesn't even hesitate before splitting from the patrol to check on the source of the noise. They quickly regret their impulsivity, however, when an angry weasel bursts across the rocks, chattering loudly! s_c gets quite the scare, but thankfully the weasel only wanted to get away from them and quickly runs off back behind the rocks.
fail_text.injury: r_c takes the lead in checking the source of the noise and comes face to face with an angry fox! Though they backpedal rapidly, the fox still manages to take a bite out of them before the rest of the patrol can back them up.

history_text.scar: p_l gained a scar from a fox.

intro_text: As the patrol is checking the border lines, they hear an odd sound coming from just beyond a rock fall.
decline_text: It's probably nothing. The patrol leaves the noise alone and continues on their way.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c drops down into a hunting crouch, certain that a mouse must be the source of the noise.  They find themselves to be correct when they pounce across the rocks and return to the patrol with the tasty morsel dangling from their mouth.
success_text.stat_skill: p_l pads towards the rock fall to check on the noise when a rabbit suddenly bursts out!  s_c is quick to react and manages to snag the rabbit before it can disappear.

fail_text.unscathed_common: p_l pads towards the rock fall to check on the noise when a rabbit suddenly bursts out! None of the cats are quick enough to catch it, but at least the noise was nothing dangerous.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c doesn't even hesitate before splitting from the patrol to check on the source of the noise. They quickly regret their impulsivity, however, when an angry weasel bursts across the rocks, chattering loudly! s_c gets quite the scare, but thankfully the weasel only wanted to get away from them and quickly runs off back behind the rocks.
fail_text.death: r_c takes the lead in checking the source of the noise and comes face to face with a snarling wolverine! r_c yowls for their patrol but the other cats aren't quick enough to stop the wolverine from killing r_c in one quick and deadly swipe.
fail_text.injury: r_c takes the lead in checking the source of the noise and comes face to face with an angry fox! Though they backpedal rapidly, the fox still manages to take a bite out of them before the rest of the patrol can back them up.

history_text.scar: p_l gained a scar from a fox.
history_text.reg_death: p_l was killed by a wolverine.

intro_text: As the patrol is checking the border lines, they hear an odd sound coming from just beyond a rock fall.
decline_text: It's probably nothing. They leave the noise alone and continue searching for prey.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c drops down into a hunting crouch, certain that a mouse must be the source of the noise.  They find themselves to be correct when they pounce across the rocks and continue on their patrol with the tasty morsel dangling from their mouth.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c pads towards the grass to check on the noise when a rabbit suddenly bursts out! s_c is quick to react and manages to snag the rabbit before it can disappear.

fail_text.unscathed_common: p_l pads towards the rock fall to check on the noise when a rabbit suddenly bursts out! They aren't quick enough to catch it, but at least the noise was nothing dangerous.
fail_text.unscathed_stat: s_c doesn't even hesitate before going to check on the source of the noise. They quickly regret their impulsivity, however, when an angry weasel bursts across the rocks, chattering loudly! s_c gets quite the scare, but thankfully the weasel only wanted to get away from them and quickly runs off back behind the rocks.
fail_text.death: r_c takes the lead in checking the source of the noise and comes face to face with a snarling wolverine! r_c yowls for help, but they're alone on this patrol and they have the sudden realization that no one can help them now.  The wolverine kills the lone cat with little trouble.
fail_text.injury: r_c heads toward the source of the noise and comes face to face with an angry fox! Though they backpedal rapidly, the fox still manages to take a bite out of them before they can sprint away.

history_text.scar: p_l gained a scar from a fox.
history_text.reg_death: p_l was killed by a wolverine while patrolling alone.
history_text.lead_death: were killed by a predator while patrolling alone

intro_text: r_c encounters a swarm of Twolegs, gathered at the foot of the mountain.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to hunt elsewhere.

success_text.unscathed_common: r_c immediately turns and heads for home to report this to their leader, alarmed by the sudden presence of Twolegs in their territory.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Slyly, r_c uses the unusual presence of the weird Twoleg to help their hunt, hiding on the outskirts of the area and waiting for the Twolegs to flush prey towards them. It works, and they leave the Twolegs to their business.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c spots the Twolegs unloading metal boxes from their monsters, and recognizes that it can't be anything good, leaving immediately.
success_text.stat_trait: s_c spits in the Twolegs' direction and decides to pick a different place to hunt.

fail_text.death: r_c mostly ignores the Twolegs as they hunt, crawling into a metal box to follow the scent of food. But when they try to back up, the way is blocked, and there's nothing they can do - eventually the Twolegs notice, and r_c is taken by them.
fail_text.stat_death: s_c has heard terrible things about Twolegs, but they still creep closer when one falls and starts yowling with pain. It's a mistake, and a trap snaps shut around them. They're taken out of the mountains with the injured Twoleg.

intro_text: Your patrol encounters a swarm of Twolegs, gathered at the foot of the mountain.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to hunt elsewhere.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol immediately turns and heads for home to report this to their leader, alarmed by the sudden presence of Twolegs in their territory.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Slyly, the cats use the unusual presence of the weird Twolegs to help their hunt, hiding on the outskirts of the area and waiting for the Twolegs to flush prey towards them. It works, and they leave the Twolegs to their business.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c spots the Twolegs unloading metal boxes from their monsters, and abruptly tells the patrol to leave. Now.
success_text.stat_trait: s_c stops anyone from going near the Twolegs, repeating that true warriors have nothing to do with Twolegs and their monsters, and the patrol leaves back up the mountain.

fail_text.death: r_c mostly ignores the Twolegs as they hunt, crawling into a metal box to follow the scent of food. But when they try to back up, the way is blocked, and there's nothing they or the patrol can do - eventually the Twolegs notice, and r_c is taken by them.
fail_text.stat_death: s_c has heard terrible things about Twolegs, but they still creep closer when one falls and starts yowling with pain. It's a mistake, and a trap snaps shut around them. They're taken out of the mountains with the injured Twoleg.

intro_text: Your patrol encounters a swarm of Twolegs, gathered at the foot of the mountain.
decline_text: Your patrol decides to hunt elsewhere.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol immediately turns and heads for home to report this to their leader, alarmed by the sudden presence of Twolegs in their territory.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Slyly, the cats use the unusual presence of the weird Twolegs to help their hunt, hiding on the outskirts of the area and waiting for the Twolegs to flush prey towards them. It is a huge success! They leave the Twolegs about their business, more focused on the food.
success_text.stat_skill: s_c spots the Twolegs unloading metal boxes from their monsters, and abruptly tells the patrol to leave. Now.
success_text.stat_trait: s_c stops anyone from going near the Twolegs, repeating that true warriors have nothing to do with Twolegs and their monsters, and the patrol leaves back up the mountain.

fail_text.death: r_c mostly ignores the Twolegs as they hunt, crawling into a metal box to follow the scent of food. But when they try to back up, the way is blocked, and there's nothing they or the patrol can do - eventually the Twolegs notice, and r_c is taken by them.
fail_text.stat_death: s_c has heard terrible things about Twolegs, but they still creep closer when one falls and starts yowling with pain. It's a mistake, and a trap snaps shut around them. They're taken out of the mountains with the injured Twoleg.

intro_text: The patrol comes across a Thunderpath running through the mountains.
decline_text: They decide it is better not to cross.

success_text.unscathed_common: Your patrol waits until they can hear the wind whistling, not a murmur of a monster, and crosses the Thunderpath to hunt on the other side.
success_text.unscathed_rare: Your patrol finds a pipe running under the Thunderpath and uses it to cross. They end up with slightly damp paws, but a successful haul of prey.
success_text.stat_skill: Your patrol stops on the edge of the Thunderpath, and s_c organizes a thorough search that finds a flattened squirrel. It's a reminder of the danger of the Thunderpath, and a good source of scavenged meat.
success_text.stat_trait: s_c is patient enough to wait until the Thunderpath is completely clear, then trots across calmly to hunt on the other side. The mountains have so few monsters passing through anyway, there's no need to be hasty.

fail_text.unscathed_common: r_c hears a monster thundering towards them, but it screeches to a halt just in time. That was close! Maybe it's best to go back to camp.
fail_text.death: r_c is hit by a monster while crossing and dies instantly. c_n is shaken by the death, and it's a reminder to every cat that just because their territory contains few Thunderpaths doesn't mean they can forget their dangers.
fail_text.injury: r_c is hit by a monster and seems quite injured, but miraculously still alive. c_n is shaken by the incident, and it's a reminder to every cat that just because their territory contains few Thunderpaths doesn't mean they can forget their dangers.

history_text.scar: r_c was heavily injured by a monster, and carries the scars from it.
history_text.reg_death: r_c was hit by a monster and killed.

fail_text.death: r_c is crossing the Thunderpath and hears a monster thundering towards them. They freeze, and the monster swerves to hit them deliberately, killing them instantly. c_n is shaken by the death, and it's a reminder to every cat that just because their territory contains few Thunderpaths doesn't mean they can forget their dangers.
fail_text.injury: r_c is hit by a monster and seems quite injured, but miraculously still alive. c_n is shaken by the incident, and it's a reminder to every cat that just because their territory contains few Thunderpaths doesn't mean they can forget their dangers.

history_text.scar: r_c was heavily injured by a monster, and carries the scars from it.
history_text.reg_death: r_c was hit by a monster and killed.
